none: Terminators Of Endearment - Jesus Christ - I Can't Believe It's Christma Already
Jesus Christ - I Can't Believe It's Christma Already
Terminators Of Endearment - Jesus Christ - I Can't Believe It's Christma Already

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on August 18, 2024 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Here you go - both tracks from the not-at-all-sought-after Stranger In The Manger 45 with a few other doses of campy acoustic country rock from late '80s San Francisco. There's a BIRDBOYS connection here and you've got Kevin Army production to help confirm my suspicion that these are sounds from aged-out SF punks. I suppose I probably should have dropped this on (or closer to) the referenced holiday, but it's not a thing that I historically celebrate so I'm gonna jam the ukelele driven "Christmastime In California" and "Merry Christmas, Manic Depressives" in mid-August. Can't think of a reason for to not do the same.JESUS CHRIST I CAN'T BELIEVE IT'S CHRISTMAS ALREADY 
https://terminalescape.blogspot.com/2024/01/penelope-houston-birdboys.html
